titleStmt.title: By order from Mr. Vice-Chancellor. VVhereas complaint has been brought to me of several disorders committed in and about the new tenis-court, where His Royall Highness the Duke of York's servants now act; ...
titleStmt.author: University of Oxford.
Mews, Peter, 1619-1706.

notesStmt.note: Title from heading and first lines of text.
Signed and dated at end: July 10. 1671. P. Mews Vice-Cancel.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
